item.title: Melisande add a quote by Margaret Atwood
item.description: "Don't let the bastards grind you down." -- Margaret Atwood

item.title: Melisande add a quote by Laurell K. Hamilton
item.description: "Friends don't count the cost of favors." -- Laurell K. Hamilton

item.title: Melisande add a quote by Laurell K. Hamilton
item.description: "Maybe they know what I know, that the true way to a man's heart is six inches of metal between his ribs. Sometimes four inches will do the job, but to be really sure, I like to have six." -- Laurell K. Hamilton

item.title: Melisande add a quote by Laurell K. Hamilton
item.description: "Still it might be nice, once in a while, not to have to choose between evils. Just once, couldn't I choose the lesser good?" -- Laurell K. Hamilton

item.title: Melisande add a quote by Kim Harrison
item.description: "What are you?" I rasped. It smiled. "Whatever scares you." -- Kim Harrison

item.title: Melisande add a quote by Mercedes Lackey
item.description: "Truth and trust are the means by which civilization holds off barbarism." -- Mercedes Lackey

item.title: Melisande add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "Most books on witchcraft will tell you that witches work naked. This is because most books on witchcraft were written by men." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Melisande add a quote by Jim Butcher
item.description: "Paranoid? Probably. But just because you're paranoid doesn't mean there isn't an invisible demon about to eat your face." -- Jim Butcher

item.title: Melisande add a quote by Jim Butcher
item.description: "You know how confusing the whole good-evil concept is for me." -- Jim Butcher

item.title: Melisande add a quote by Anne McCaffrey
item.description: "A good story is a good story no matter who wrote it." -- Anne McCaffrey

item.title: Melisande add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "He's like a drug for you, Bella." -- Stephenie Meyer

item.title: Melisande add a quote by Kim Harrison
item.description: "Hey, ah, does anyone want a cookie or something? Oh yeah. A cookie. That would make everything better. Dunked in a shot of tequila , maybe? Or better yet, just the bottle? Yeah, that ought to do it." -- Kim Harrison

item.title: Melisande add a quote by Kim Harrison
item.description: "That's why I want you there, he said. You're unpredictable, and that can be the difference between success and failure. Most people make decisions in anger, fear, love, or obligation. You make decisions to irritate people." -- Kim Harrison

item.title: Melisande add a quote by Paul F. Davis
item.description: "If you don't feel it, flee from it. Go where you are celebrated, not merely tolerated." -- Paul F. Davis

item.title: Melisande add a quote by Jim Butcher
item.description: "When everything goes to hell, the people who stand by you without flinching -- they are your family. " -- Jim Butcher

item.title: Melisande add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "I'd far rather be happy than right any day." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Melisande add a quote by Sujata Massey
item.description: "Crockery broke and fabric frayed. The delicate things I cared about perished, while the hard things like swords survived." -- Sujata Massey
